Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-29195 affecting package azure-iot-sdk-c for versions less than 2024.03.04-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-29195 affecting package azure-iot-sdk-c for versions less than 2024.03.04-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package azure-iot-sdk-c is earlier than 2024.03.04-1, affected by CVE-2024-29195
